<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Learn English Kids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie Englische Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez Les Gosses Anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda Miúdos Ingleses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari I Capretti Inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε τα αγγλικά κατσίκια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda A Cabritos Ingleses</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The British Council site with games, songs, stories and other activities for kids and their teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stories</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">songs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die British Councilsite mit Spielen, Lieden, 
Geschichten und anderen Aktivitäten für Zicklein und ihre Lehrer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le site du Conseil britannique avec des jeux, des
chansons, des histoires et d'autres activités pour des gosses et 
leurs professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O local do conselho britânico com jogos, 
canções, histórias e outras atividades para miúdos e seus 
professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il luogo del Consiglio britannico con i giochi, 
le canzoni, le storia ed altre attività per i capretti ed i loro 
insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιοχή του βρετανικού Συμβουλίου με τα παιχνίδια, 
τα τραγούδια, τις ιστορίες και άλλες δραστηριότητες για τα 
κατσίκια και τους δασκάλους τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sitio del consejo británico con los juegos, 
las canciones, las historias y otras actividades para los cabritos y 
sus profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chansons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">histórias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giochi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
